website_summaries.verdict: Easily extend and lock this lightweight shaver to your preferred length. The safety blade offers a smooth shave, whether shaving wet or dry.
pros: Fully extends to 19.5 inches for hard to reach areas
Easily lock the arm in place with security lock
4-inch blade can be used for wet or dry shaves
Includes two blades in the pack
cons: Users say they would like the set to come with more replacement blades

customer_reviews.title: It works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well all I can say is I wish I had found this a long time ago this is a great product it does a amazing job my wife loves it she does not have to shave my back with a little razor that gets clogged she can easily get the area that I miss with this razor and it takes lot less time and she loves it for her legs if you are thinking about getting one do it you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: James Steele

customer_reviews.title: Back shaving made easy.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The best purchase I have made this year. I'm able to reach my entire back with the extendable handle and the 2in blade cuts down on the time It takes to shave my back. Wish this product would have come out 20yrs ago. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can help with more than just hairy backs!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loved this razor! He uses it in the shower as rinsing as he shaves gives the best outcome. The big surprise for me was, I could use it to shave my legs. A back injury had made it difficult for me to shave. What a difference this razor made! Try it. You will be amazed how helpful it can be .
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia J.

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Works good. I was able to reach all areas on my back despite having arthritis in both shoulders. Used dry, no cuts, but my back hair is pretty light.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Star

customer_reviews.title: Great entry-level shaver
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the shaver. It does what it's intended, but takes a little bit of work due to the flat edge design (others having a curve and other means to deal contours of the back). Don't take this as a knock on the product because it's a great value, sturdy and does its job, but after a few uses you may start looking at other models depending upon your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Alley

customer_reviews.title: Great back razor!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for one of these and after reading through the different models I chose this model. It arrived fast and is sturdy and has worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good device
customer_reviews.text: After a little bit of a rough start, I believe I've figured out the angles to properly use this device. It's not perfect, but it's still good.
customer_reviews.author: Stv

customer_reviews.title: Good shave
customer_reviews.text: It's a life saver. Easy to use and has a guard to protect from cutting, so that is a plus. Takes a little bit to get used to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and it is really great. Easy to use and love that it can extend.
customer_reviews.author: Pearlbird

customer_reviews.title: Good item!
customer_reviews.text: It was sharper then it looks but not enough to hurt you as long as your careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter L.

customer_reviews.title: Quick, Easy, VERY SHARP
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and gets the job done effortlessly. Careful on the curves, I had mild nicks I didn’t feel, but wife pointed out to me. Overall, 9 out of 10
customer_reviews.author: Joe Harper

customer_reviews.title: It is worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This back shaver is awesome. As a single guy with no one to help me with the hair on my back, this was the answer. It is easy to use and reaches all the areas. It shaves really well and I am very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM D CURRY

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Cuts very well, the only scrapes I got were from my own carelessness
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but electric groomers are better.
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my back hairs. First time I used I had a lot of scratches. The issue is the angle. You have to try to get the right angle and not press too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This shaver seems well made, was easy to use and worked well. Even comes with it's own storage pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Tunester

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but take your time wheb
customer_reviews.text: Be careful, there is no rush to groom yourself. You can seriously cut yourself if you don’t go slow and pay attention to what you are doing. Overall, this product is sturdy and does exactly what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Makes shaving my back a lot easier and less hassle having to my wife do it for me. I can do it whenever I want.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Brown

customer_reviews.title: I was able to get the reach I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great shaver, I used it on my back and it was great, I was able to reach every where I needed. I've tried other shavers and this one by far is the best one. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Charles cannella

customer_reviews.title: As advertised! Good price
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I do not have heavy back hair, but it is there. Was easy to use and did the trick. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It's broken
customer_reviews.text: Received the first day.Opening the package, I found it was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Morales

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This back blade works great. It’s very easy to use and Ieft no razor burn. In just a few minutes I had a clean smooth back. It’s something I’ll use from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Works Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband. He had only used once and liked it. The length of the handle and the width of the blade is great.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth T. Goode

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well. It’s not super smooth but mostly does what you need it to do for visual purposes Recommended def
customer_reviews.author: J-Sco

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works better than I anticipated. Easy to use. Adjustable handle was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: mica murdoch

customer_reviews.title: Good tool!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the razor because of the large blade and the long handle is great for those hard to reach areas.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W Scott

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works well. No surprises. A good purchase. A more ergonomic design would be the only improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use as promised, prompt delivery! It was a quick delivery time and the product is easy to use, easy to clean and store. I plan on using it for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: As easy as getting your back waxed without the embarrassment
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use- takes a few tries to use properly
customer_reviews.author: Raul R Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The angel makes it hard to reach the middle of the back
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: It works as described. Some spots are tricky without it being angled but it definitely does the job. Works better with shaving cream.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Life made easy!
customer_reviews.text: This product made it so easy! I no longer have to be double jointed to get the results I want. Reaching my back is so easy now! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. The handle seems well made and should last a long time. I have had plastic versions before that broke.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: They back shaver worked as I expected and removed all the body hair that bothered me for way too long!
customer_reviews.author: g0lakers

customer_reviews.title: Works well at a very fair price
customer_reviews.text: Takes care of the hairs easily. length is appropriate to reach all areas, No More Cave Man!
customer_reviews.author: BigNationDave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to see if it could help reach areas that I couldn’t get on my back. The adjustable handle makes it easy and light weight to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp blades, did a good job on my back. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jose Renteria

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to find how easy this was to use and how durable the product is also. This will last me a long time. Happy I made the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gail A. Sorg

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: I've used it twice and it has been very effective.
customer_reviews.author: James Vose

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good product and work better than I expected
customer_reviews.author: J C McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Works well just be slow and gentle.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for me. Used for back hair which is not thick or course.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Human again
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about buying this. The older I get, the more hair travels down my body. My back was looking like my front, I was tired looking like an animal. Anyway I thought I'd try this. I was impressed how easy it was to use. After a shower, I ran it over my back and I was quite pleased at the results. We are going on a cruise soon and I wanted to get rid of the hair. My wife says it's much better... I feel better. try it
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: convenient and quick, extends to my needs; well designed and exactly what i needed. thx
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the adjustable handle which made it easy to reach everywhere. I had no issues even the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Jelsch

customer_reviews.title: Quick and clean application
customer_reviews.text: For hair removal. Quick process in shower Very effective and able to reach all areas..
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! No cuts over contoured areas and the blade is good for multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Ike

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works just like it says. Very easy to assemble and use.
customer_reviews.author: jkeddy77

customer_reviews.title: Slick and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Good coverage of back stead without twisting and turning.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Works great - easy to use, and doesn't irritate my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well but nicked a lot of places on my back
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Overall the shaver is good quality but the angle of the blade bar is ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall the shaver is good quality but the angle of the blade bar is too close to the handle. It doesn't work as well on muscular backs with contours. If the blade bar were to be pulled away from the handle, it would yield better results.
customer_reviews.author: John LaRoche

customer_reviews.title: Worthless!!
customer_reviews.text: The blades are too dull to cut. Go over the same spot 20 times and it leaves irritation and still doesn’t cut all the hair. Junk
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: First of all the instruction on how to attach the blade to handle could be much better. Before I knew it I had broken both clips trying to assemble the blade to the handle.
customer_reviews.author: mckinley irvin

customer_reviews.title: Angle of blade
customer_reviews.text: The angle of the blade on the handle makes the device useless....the blades are ok if used without the handle. If the maker changed the angle slightly this would be a 5 star device
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Works like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for something like this for a while. This back razor works great. For those hard to reach areas, this gives a close, smooth easy shave to the back. Blades are sharp so once you get used to holding it in the right positions, you can lightly stroke those unwanted back hairs away. My back is smooth from just above my buttocks to between my shoulder blades & up to the base of my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality,  sturdy product , not flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back shaver for my son and daughter who live in college, they both like it, the long handle is sturdy and the blades are sharp, great quality at a great price.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use! Great even for legs!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Back Shaver! I bought it after surgery because I couldn't lean over far enough to shave my legs. It worked great! Yo do have to be careful with the blade as even though it is a safety blade, it can still cause nicks and cuts. I wish I had bought mine sooner! Thank you NewLife!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good Back Razor
customer_reviews.text: My back grows itchy wiry hair, that often gets ingrown. So, I thought I would try this back razor (as my wife is not always available and I cannot reach many spots with an ordinary razor). Overall, I am satisfied. I do have a caution: the blades are very sharp, so go slowly loading, unloading, handling and shaving. It is an acquired skill. Once you get the hang of it, it is helpful grooming tool. Incidentally, aside from the cost of waxing, my body's skin cannot tolerate waxing. I did cut myself before I realized that I had to be very careful. That said, it works for me....
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not good for initial shave. UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: I am very furry and with initial shave of my back, having not shaved in a while, the blade kept clogging and I nicked my shoulder blade. I had to have my wife finish me with an electric shaver. Having said that, I think this shaver might work better with daily shaving and I'll report back on that. After having my wife shave my back I started using this razer in the shower and it has worked very well! I use it about every other day. The razer seems to be good for about 15 - 20 shaves and I will probably change to the second blade.
customer_reviews.author: David Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: a big hairy failure
customer_reviews.text: I really had high hopes for this. But it was an utter failure in design. It is not adjustable in regards the angle. It is set to one angle and unless im perfectly positioned, it hardly does anything. Wet, dry, it doesn't matter, Arching my back helps only slightly, but it is positioned in such an angle, that i have to keep the handle almost against my back which makes it near impossible to get anything accomplished. i end up just using my regular razor again and work on my contorting my arms into very uncomfortable positions while cursing that i even bought this
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kenney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Back Shaver
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how effective this back shaver is. It can be a bit of a learning curve if you never used one of these before. However, once you start, you'll wonder why you never shaved your back before. The instruction that came with the back shaver were incomplete, but after e-mail the seller Halo I got a more in-depth guide and they replace a blade that broke in the process. I couldn't be more pleased, I would definitely buy from them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Shraifer

customer_reviews.title: It's what I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: This back razor is fantastic. I have been looking for a way to shave my own back and this "hit the spot" as they say. It was very easy to use and, along with a mirror that accommodates a view, got my entire back without cuts or missing patches. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I'll get the hang of it because I keep cutting myself. Works well. A little too well.
customer_reviews.author: Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Great product & seller!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent on all accounts. Seller is the very best! Quick shipping & quality product!!
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Love It! - Not a back scratcher
customer_reviews.text: I own this and a dual blade version. I like them both. Don't use them like a back scratcher, you will cut yourself. Since I started treating like a razor, no cuts!
customer_reviews.author: Brian A

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: It's not a complicated tool but it's a useful, safe and effective. I would recommend it to anyone else need something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Babak Pedram

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Reaches my back without me bending my arms like pretzels. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: DeDee

customer_reviews.title: Really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! No blood...haha..simple and easy. Make sure you have a mirror and it’s simple!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Dimension

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Did a good job, at same time, I didn’t feel like I was going to cut my back up.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works very well!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I am really happy with it. At the beginning it takes a few minutes to get use to it if you are using a mirror. My back hair is gone and my wife really enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very good so far
customer_reviews.text: Still early but so far so good. The blade seems like it will not cut my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Epps

customer_reviews.title: IT's just what i needed, the extendable handle provides good reach.
customer_reviews.text: IT's just what i needed, the extendable handle provides good reach and the blade guard prevents me from cutting myself. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Mid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excelent item for me. It change my life hahahaha for real. Also i need but more blades.
customer_reviews.author: Delacroyx

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Just wished I had found this item sooner! Nice wide blade so as to reach all areas of my back. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Miller

customer_reviews.title: great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 for my sons for Christmas gifts, let’s say they became animated and joyous about the shaver - we’re apprecituve due too long handle .
customer_reviews.author: Debra DAmato

customer_reviews.title: comes in a nice storage pouch too
customer_reviews.text: Handle is plenty long, comes in a nice storage pouch too!
customer_reviews.author: Southern girl

customer_reviews.title: It's effective. But the blade is sharp - be ...
customer_reviews.text: It's effective. But the blade is sharp - be careful (and use shave cream) or else your back may be grazed.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernSkyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Not needed.
customer_reviews.text: Have a friend do it with any type of clipper.
customer_reviews.author: DV in SD CA

customer_reviews.title: This product seems pretty well thought out
customer_reviews.text: This product seems pretty well thought out, however if you can't quite reach your back in the right way you will end up with cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Tweety 2491

customer_reviews.title: Works but not easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to use and get a clean shave. You have to use two people to get all the hair on your back. There are some spots you just can't get a good angle to shave hair. After 2 shaves the blade stopped cutting hair with one swipe. You have to go over areas several times.
customer_reviews.author: Auggie

product_meta.title: NewLifeStore DIY Back Shaver 20 Inch Extra Long Handled Body Groomer and Trimmer Kit Back Hair Razor
product_meta.description:
About the Back Hair Shaver

This is a Gospel of men! DIY Back hair shaver is the newest and most advanced back shaver available for men 

to quickly and easily eliminate their back hair. It features a professional handle you can extend the lock 

at any length you choose. The extreme reach of the shaver measures over 20 inches in length when fully extended,

allowing you to reach even the most difficult middle and lower portions of the back.

Features

Adjustable Handle - adjust the handle length from 14 inches to 19.5 inches by rotating the handle. 

Can help you shave any part of body easily.

Amazing effective - get rid of your unwanted hair without spending a fortune, give you a wonderful 

experience after use our back shaver.

Unique design –Its ergonomic, easy-grip handle and perfectly sharp blade will offer you a seamless shaving experience, 

protecting your sensitive skin from irritations, cuts or razor bumps!

Best choice for gift – This authentic pro men’s back hair shaver is a good choice for BF, Husband, Brother or Father!

Easy to use - Over 4" Wide Safety Blade and No Shaving Cream Required.

ATTENTION

1. Keep the back shaver out of reach of children.

2. Before shaving, take a warm shower. Steaming and soaking soften the hair and skin for better shaving.

3. After shaving, return to shower and rinse back with cool water closes pores, soothes off cream and cut hair.

4. Shaving your back hair will not cause the hair to grow back thicker, longer or darker. 

Package list

1 x Back Shaver body

2 x Back Shaver Blade

1 x User Manual
feature_bullets: ADJUSTABLE BACK SAVER – The size can be adjusted from 14.2 inches to 19.5 inches, shave wet or dry
PROFESSIONAL PREMIUM BLADE DESIGN – Over 4" wide safety blade to reduce risk of cutting
EXTREME REACH – Anti-slip and adjustable handle perfect for accessing the hardest areas to be reached
ERGONOMIC AND LIGHT WEIGHT DESIGN – The Back Shaver makes the hair removal process smoothly and pain-free, easy to handle
WHAT YOU GET – High quality back shaver, 30 days money-back warranty, 7*24 hours friendly customer service
